definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: shore, coast (as surrounding, enclosing)—´[[ח]] only cstr. Ge 49:13, Ge 49:13 + 5 t.:—shore of sea [[הַיׇּם]] ´[[ה]] De 1:7, Jos 9:1 (both D), Ju Jdg 5:17, Je 47:7, Ez Eze 25:16; [[יַמִּים]] ´[[ח]] Ge 49:13 (poem); ´[[ח]] [[אֳנִיּוֹת]] v:Eze 25:13 the shore of ships, i.e. to which ships come.
